data.title: Law Office of Patrick J. Sullivan, Esq.
data.meta_description: Turn to the Law Office of Patrick J. Sullivan, Esq. provides family law, litigation, criminal law, and estate and probate legal services in RI.
data.text:
At the Law Office of Patrick J. Sullivan, Esq. our attorneys work to help you achieve your legal goals. We provide a range of legal services to support that process, including family law, criminal law, and litigation. When you need fast, reliable help, reach out to us for help.

Comprehensive, client-focused legal services in Rhode Island, are always available to you from our team. You may need help with an estate and trust to plan for your future and that of your loved ones. You may be thinking about child custody and divorce. Many of our clients are facing more complex areas of law, including municipal law and appellate law.

No matter what you are facing, we want to help you. With years of experience and such a wide range of services, you can trust in calling the Law Office of Patrick J. Sullivan, Esq., for all of your legal needs. Our team is compassionate but aggressive at protecting your rights and creating the best possible outcome in your case.

Let us help you by scheduling a consultation with our attorneys in Rhode Island, today. Weâ€™re happy to assist you today.
